summary: Retextures the game\'s coins to look like those distributed by the Teutonic Order in the middle ages.
descriptionHtml:
Teutonic Coin version 1.0
A MOD for TES V: Skyrim by LieutenantHawk

After seeing all of the modern coin retextures of Skyrim\'s septims, I decided to do one as well. I think it looks fitting enough for the land of Skyrim.


--{Features}--

A retexture of the septim coins, done using a photograph of a real one. It\'s a Medieval coin, the type used by the Teutonic Order during its reign over East Prussia and other territories in northeastern Europe. 

UPDATE: The coin has been retextured to include a proper reverse side. Thanks to Profd for pointing it out for me.


--{Installation}--

Copy the \"Textures\" folder into your \"Skyrim\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\" folder. If you are prompted to overwrite files, say \"yes.\" 


--{Bugs/Conflicts}--

It\'s not combatible with other coin retextures, obviously, but that\'s it.


--{Copyright}--

No distribution or alteration without my permission.


--{Credits}--

Bethesda Softworks for making Skyrim, of course. Coin photo is from an unknown source. Texture work was done by me.

To contact me: The most obvious would be via Skyrim Nexus, but I am also on deviantART and Yahoo under the same name.
author: LieutenantHawk
